summary: Adds a HearthFires based plant-able garden in Wyrmstooth - Fort Valus player home.
descriptionHtml:
Hearthfire owners can have an additional garden in Wyrmstooth player home now. Make your stay in Wyrmstooth a little bit more enhanced!

Just buying the normal garden upgrade of "Fort Valus" will enable this additional garden just beside Fort Valus Common House entrance. It'll work fine even if already purchased the garden upgrade.

New in version 1.01 - You can even plant unique ingredients native to Wyrmstooth in your Wyrmstooth home garden. Extra plant-able Ingredients are Bog Beacon, Elf Cup Cap & Fungus Stalk.

New in version 1.02 - You can  plant unique ingredients native to Wyrmstooth in all the gardens of Skyrim even added by other mods. There is an optional file for "More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants".

Requirements:

1. [size=5]Hearthfire[/size] DLC with latest Skyrim patch v 1.9.32.0.8
2. [size=5]Wyrmstooth [/size]by [size=3]jonx0r[/size]
. Get this awesome mod at - www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25704/?

Installation:

Mod Manager: 

Download via NMM & activate the mod. Deactivate to uninstall.

Manual:

Download WPHG.rar & unzip it via Winrar or 7zip. Manually copy the WPHG.esp,Textures & Meshes Folders in the data folder & activate the WPHG.esp via your launcher or mod manager. Place it under Wyrmstooth.esp or place it all the way down.

Just delete the file to uninstall.

[size=3]Compatibility[/size]: Should be compatible with anything as long as it doesn't edit the plant-able ingredient & flora list. 

Now supports "[size=4]More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants[/size]" by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4525451]numberland[/url]. Who doesn't want all the plants in one garden? So you need the all dlc version of the said mod & you can plant everything together in all the gardens. Just remember to put WPHG.esp under both Wyrmstooth.esp & more plants all.esp or more plants all extra.esp in mod manager.

Recommended:

More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants"

Link: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26851/?

Future plans:

1. Bog Beacon & Elf Cup Cap grows all over the planter soil! Working on fixing the models!


Permission & Credits:

Its a Nexus exclusive so no uploading anywhere else!

Credit to Bethesda for making Skyrim & letting us use Creation Kit.
Credit to jonx0r for his ultra awesome 'Wyrmstooth". It always felt like playing an official dlc.
Credit to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4525451]numberland[/url] for his very useful More plants & Recipes mod.
author: anik50

files.name: Wyrmstooth Player House Garden 1_01
files.changelogHtml:
1. Remade version 1.01 again from scratch. It wasn't letting the unique plants of Wyrmstooth to be planted at all!

2. Removed unnecessary textures & meshes. Cleaned via Tes5edit as much as possible.

3. It is now NMM compatible.

files.name: Wyrmstooth Player House Garden 1_02
files.changelogHtml:
1. You can plant unique ingredients of Wyrmstooth in all player house gardens now. Previously it was possible only in Fort Valus player house garden.

2. Added optional "More plants & Recipes" support.
